author: Hallie Cotnam
title: Why some are calling it 'COVID-19 pounds'
description: We're told to stay home during this pandemic, and so we should. But home is where the fridge is, and many of us are eating our way through this crisis, laying the groundwork for different health problems.
content: You've seen the endless images of homemade bread, the sourdough-saturated social media. You've read about friends who are eschewing fitted attire for the the elastic freedom of sweat pants. You've heeded the siren call of local restaurants offering comfort fo… [+3737 chars]
